coe528.project

Class SceneManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • coe528.project.SceneManager

  • public class SceneManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for showing all scenes in the stage and moving from one scene to another.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SceneManager(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
      Class constructor that initializes the primary stage of the application

      Load and display the Login UI screen
